entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
